plot: On her way to Grandma's house, an innocent young lass encounters three deadly foe in the woods. What shall become of Betty Boots?
title: The Tale of Betty Boots
plot_es: On her way to Grandma's house, an innocent young lass encounters three deadly foe in the woods. What shall become of Betty Boots?
plot_en: On her way to Grandma's house, an innocent young lass encounters three deadly foe in the woods. What shall become of Betty Boots?
